RMI.Server

类 SDServerResponseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMI.RMIBase.SDRemoteConnection
      • RMI.Server.SDServerResponseConnection

  • public class SDServerResponseConnection
extends SDRemoteConnection
    The SDServerResponseConnection handle the RMI request from the client and return values back to client.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 RMI.RMIBase.SDRemoteConnection

        in, out, socket
